statements: UPDATE courses SET instructor='John Doe', start_date='2022-08-15' WHERE course_id=1;
UPDATE courses SET is_completed=TRUE, end_date='2022-10-30' WHERE course_id=2;
UPDATE courses SET instructor = 'John Doe', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE courses SET course_name = 'Advanced Mathematics', start_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE instructor = 'Jane Smith';
UPDATE courses SET start_date = '2022-10-05' WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE student_progress SET progress_percentage = 80, completed = true WHERE course_id = '654e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE courses SET end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE student_progress SET completed = true, progress_percentage = 100 WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE courses SET course_name = 'Mathematics' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE course_progress SET progress_status = 'Completed', progress_percent = 100 WHERE course_id = 1 AND student_id = 1;
UPDATE courses SET course_name = 'Advanced Physics' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE course_progress SET progress_status = 'In Progress', progress_percent = 75 WHERE course_id = 2 AND student_id = 3;
UPDATE Courses SET course_name = 'Data Science', course_duration = 10 WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE Enrollments SET completion_status = TRUE, enrollment_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE enrollment_id = 3;
UPDATE Courses SET course_description = 'Updated course description' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE Enrollments SET completion_status = TRUE WHERE enrollment_id = 3;
UPDATE courses SET course_name = 'Updated Course A', course_description = 'New description' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE students SET student_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE student_id = 2;
UPDATE courses SET course_name = 'Data Structures and Algorithms', course_description = 'Advanced concepts in data structures and algorithms' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE enrollments SET completed = TRUE WHERE student_id = 2 AND course_id = 3;
